title: Retiring Abroad: What It's Like to Live in Southern France
description: After Lynne Garell’s husband died of cancer, she told friends she was moving to France for a year. She found a place in the small village of Bize-Minervois in south central France and has never left. She discusses her experiences with Silvia Ascarelli, the author of MarketWatch's "Where Should I Retire?" column.
